OurGame.text1: Happy Astronauts is an ultra realistic open world mtaverse game like no other. We are currently developing it on the Unreal Engin 5 with the targetd full release in Q4 2022.

OurGame.text2: The game consists of several game modes such as Adventure, Creative, Battle Royal and more. You will be able to unlock your OG Astronaut as a playable character in game and they will also unlock additional bonus items in game.

OurGame.text3: Within the game all purchases including caracter skins, weapon/vehicle skins, land, loot crates, sason passes, etc. are all NFTs. Eveerything you collect, earn, or purchase can be traded or sold to other players in game or via 3rd party marketplaces.

OurGame.text4: Utilizing our proprietary technology, NFTs, Crypto, and Blockchain fully integrate into the games metaverse and allows for an all new gaming experience.
